column5: i don’t think i’ve ever seen anything this beautiful

i’ve never seen a post i related to more. I am completely uninterested in people that have it all together and are just normal functioning people. I don’t think i could ever seen myself with someone normal

this post. leaving a relationship emotionally (even if they are a huge sack of shit)  is almost impossible for me unless i can mentally convince myself they are dead or my biggest enemy. completely blows
